articles.description: Bajaj Finance stock tumbled over 1% to Rs 7,752 today. At the current price, the company’s mcap stands at Rs 4.7 lakh crore.

articles.title: HDFC, IDFC mergers may not trigger consolidation of PSU banks: Analysts - Business Standard
articles.description: Banking Sector Stocks: There is more money to be made in PSBs as RoA expansion has peaked for private banks, analysts said
articles.content: The steep rally in the markets makes a case for the government to trim its stake in PSBs and achieve its divestment target
